name: World War II Online - STARTER
detailed_description:
Are you ready to join the fight on the Virtual Battlefield?

The Starter Account will give you the base level of access to the WWII Online world.

This level of access will allow you to play in any of the 10 personas available in game! You will be able to rank each of these personas up to Lt. Colonel (or the branch/country equivelant!)!

Within these personas, you will have access to a spawnlist of selected equipment to take the fight to the enemy!

When you attain the proper rank, You will be unlock all of the following equipment!
  • Rifleman
  • Sub Machine Gunner
  • Airborne Rifleman
  • Airborne Sub Machine Gunner
  • Airborne Light Machine Gunner
  • Airborne Mortarman
  • Airborne Anti-Tank Rifleman
  • Trucks
  • Heavy Haulers
  • Light Anti-Tank Guns
  • Light Anti-Aircraft Guns
  • Armored Fighting Vehicles (Vickers Mk. VI, Panzer IIc, Char léger Modèle 1935 R)
  • Transport Aircraft
  • Tier 0 (1939-40) Fighter Aircraft
  • Riverine Patrol Boats


In addition to this standard equipment list, as a Starter Subcriber, you will also have access to a few extras!

Every campaign we will choose two premium classes that will also be made available to you as a Starter Subscriber (you will still need the proper rank for these items, however). The premium equipment that will be made available will rotate after each campaign, so you'll be able to try something new!

short_description:
Start your WWII Online Career!

Base level access to the game world including basic units in every country and branch so you can take the fight to the enemy!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
reviews:
“The battles that follow aren’t typical of most first-person action games.”
Warfare History Network

“an incredibly fun and long lasting game for any war gamer or history buff. ... you’ll still be playing this months, or even years, from now.”
8.4/10 – Game Chronicles

“it’s remarkably compulsive. The concept and the individual challenges are unique, and the sheer difficulty of it makes riding a tank for 20 miles peculiarly rewarding. ... there’s nothing else quite like it.”
4/5 – Games Radar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or Athlon 64 3500+ (2.2 GHz) or better with SSE 2.0 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core or 2.66 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Sierra 10.12.2+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
